text: Maintain FL250, two-five-zero, and RTB by 1930 Zulu. ISR confirms ten-zero enemy movement at grid 43N753E. Engage only with PID and confirm BDA within two-four-hour cycles. ATO specifies 4 CAS sorties for TOT at 1200 Zulu, not fourteen hundred.
prompt: The audio file may contain the following terminology, listed here for your convenience: ALR, RPA, RWR, ECM, IADS, AO, FLOT, GPS, FL, RTB, Zulu, ISR, PID, BDA, ATO, CAS, TOT, JTAC, IFF, TACAN, RPA, ID, CAS, ATO, FLOT, OBJ, AWACS
